name: Heist (itch) (Kiera)
description:
A time-crunch, heist platformer where you race against the clock to rob the bank. With the cops on your tail, can you reach the vault before time runs out?

Controls:

Use WASD or arrows to control, you can jump on walls like a ninja too!

Broke Devs Studios:

Kiera - itch.io

Dane

Kun
